org.linqs.psl.application.learning.weight.search.grid

Class RandomGridSearch

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.linqs.psl.application.learning.weight.WeightLearningApplication
      • org.linqs.psl.application.learning.weight.search.grid.BaseGridSearch
        • org.linqs.psl.application.learning.weight.search.grid.GridSearch
          • org.linqs.psl.application.learning.weight.search.grid.RandomGridSearch
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ModelApplication
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GuidedRandomGridSearch, InitialWeightRandomGridSearch

    public class RandomGridSearch
extends GridSearch
    A random grid search that searches a finite number of locations. Note that choosing the next random location may be slow if the grid is large and the maximum number of locations is close to the grid size. In cases like this, it is better to just use vanilla GridSearch.
